Standard Racial Traits

  • Ability Score Racial Traits: Drow are nimble and manipulative. They gain +4 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, +2 Wisdom, +2 Charisma, and –2 Constitution.
  • Type: Drow are humanoids with the elf subtype.
  • Size: Drow are Medium creatures and thus receive no bonuses or penalties due to their size.
  • Base Speed: Drow have a base speed of 30 feet.
  • Weapon Familiarity: Drow are proficient with the @Compendium[pf1.weapons-and-ammo.BgTqaNqyS3tnLGAg]{Hand Crossbow}, @Compendium[pf1.weapons-and-ammo.LA6TC5679iOXDNwq]{Rapier}, and @Compendium[pf1.weapons-and-ammo.7tGcTtI2fEj1AFaT]{Shortsword}.
  • Languages: Drow begin play speaking Elven and Undercommon. Drow with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following languages: Abyssal, Aklo, Aquan, Common, Draconic, Drow Sign Language, Gnome, or Goblin.

Defense Racial Traits

  • Immunities: Drow are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against enchantment spells and effects.
  • Spell Resistance: Drow Nobles possess spell resistance (SR) equal to 11 plus their total number of class levels.

Feat and Skill Racial Traits

  • Keen Senses: Drow gain a +2 racial bonus on @Compendium[pf1.skills.YYmmxDgp0g3ltSUG]{Perception} checks.

Magical Racial Traits

  • Spell-Like Abilities (Su): Drow Nobles can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.zymaptg3vmnvfvxl]{Dancing Lights}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{Deeper Darkness}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{Faerie Fire}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.68m9du7zw2di7ew6]{Feather Fall} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.plou8h168bfn5hq6]{Levitate} at will, and are constantly affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.uqh87jz757r2cb7r]{Detect Magic}, using their total character level as caster level.

Offense Racial Traits

  • Poison Use: Drow are skilled in the use of poisons and never risk accidentally poisoning themselves.

Senses Racial Traits

  • Superior Darkvision: Drow have superior darkvision, allowing them to see perfectly in the dark up to 120 feet.

Weakness Racial Traits

  • Light Blindness: As deep underground dwellers naturally, drow suffer from light blindness. Abrupt exposure to any bright light @Compendium[pf1.conditions.coxrkb6qUKBZvVxP]{blinds} drow for 1 round. On subsequent rounds, they are @Compendium[pf1.conditions.2pICNUG3g7O4obyu]{dazzled} as long as they remain in the affected area.
